subject: Re: [junit] JUnit capacity testing extensions
msgSnippet: You could try loadtest unit at http://www.clarkware.com/software/JUnitPerf.html or jstrees.. Regards, Nagendra ... [Non-text portions of this message have been
messageBody:
You could try loadtest unit at
http://www.clarkware.com/software/JUnitPerf.html

or jstrees..

Regards,
Nagendra

Dinko Hadzic wrote:

> Hi,
>
>
>
> Are there any tools/JUnit extensions for running multiple instances of
> the same test in parallel (simultaneously)? Up to 30000 instances of a
> single JUnit test should be run at the same time.
>
>
>
> Or is the best way simply implementing a multithreaded JUnit test
> manually?
>
>
>
> Regards,
>
> Dinko
>
>
